layout.text:
Yá’át’ééh, shik’is dóó shidine’é. Shi ei Amber Scott yinishyé. Naasht’ézhí Tábaahá nishłí. Tsénjíkiní báshíshchíín. Áshįįhí dashicheii, dóó Kiis’áanii dashinalí.
Hello, my name is Amber Scott. I am the creator and founder of Chizhii Rez Girl Creations. I was born and raised in the heart of the Navajo Nation.
I started my small business in October, 2019 on Instagram and I'm excited to move my plateform here. A lot of my products are inspired from my community, culture, and experiances.
